lead_paragraph: Hu Shuli is attempting a comeback after her resignation from the groundbreaking magazine Caijing in November.
snippet: Hu Shuli is attempting a comeback after her resignation from the groundbreaking magazine Caijing in November.

headline.main: Pioneering Editor Takes Over New Magazine in China
headline.seo: Hu Shuli, Former Caijing Editor, to Head New Magazine in China
headline.print_headline: Pioneer Editor to Lead New Magazine in China

byline.contributor: Jonathan Ansfield contributed reporting from Beijing, and Bao Beibei contributed research from Shanghai.
